mapper.select: select * from purchasematerial
select * from purchasematerial where create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
select * from purchasematerial where create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select * from purchasematerial where create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and receive_status = #{receiveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select * from purchasematerial A where create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND A.purchase_number like CONCAT('%',#{purchaseNumber},'%')

select * from purchasematerial A where create_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime} and audit_status = #{auditStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and receive_status = #{receiveStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
